title: Grim
description: ShayI left Bowmen’s Creek six years ago to start fresh with my brothers. It was supposed to be a new beginning for us. A chance to leave our painful past behind us. But as it turned out, that past wasn’t ready to let go of us. That’s where he came in.The arrogant, stubborn biker. Mason ‘Grim’ Hanley, Vice President of the Infernal Titans Motorcycle Club.GrimI had her when we were sixteen and I lost her for six years.Until she came back.Somebody wants to hurt her. Somebody wants her dead. The Titans need to stop them.I’ve never let a women get inside my head before but there’s something different about her. Something fiery. I have to have her in every sense of the word. All I have to do now is convince her that I’m not the sixteen year old boy who ran her off the first time.
author: J.J. Cobban
